feed.title: Yamtrack Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.19.9
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed SIMKL anime import errors when the MyAnimeList ID is not provided #353 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/28fa96042437bd2774c4b193679dd381e448bb67)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.19.5...v0.19.9

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.20.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Redesigned the overall color theme of the application, see screenshots.
  • Added media total episodes/chapters/pages to the home page if available (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/77721bb102b8f5ae69b28a6ee5b4abb4cc791a40)
  • Added upcoming episodes dates to the home page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/ed8efb98310edccbf5f43573f642093dcb6b21e5)
  • Added list view to calendar page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/727b67cc2b8ab6bb6148b637f1e5eb83182cd02b)
  • Added search and sorting to lists view (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/893db3f5f13dcf651b92a2d049e92b2f08f64739)
  • Added pagination to list details view (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/54249112175768f7d5d8cf81cf3ca23decb65dd3)

Fixes

  • Fixed parsing of anime broadcasting time (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/c552ab80d95e1c189b1bda9009752da0d9820eae)
  • Removed healthcheck requests logging (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/52d628bf5c01cefd3c94df0138cad8580a28c68f)

Other

  • Limit import results history to 7 days (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/ec4ba88e551675f363c733ea465dcc1b2df31d9d)

Maintenance

  • Bump psycopg[binary] from 3.2.4 to 3.2.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/355
  • Bump aiohttp from 3.11.12 to 3.11.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/356
  • Bump ruff from 0.9.6 to 0.9.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/360
  • Bump django from 5.1.6 to 5.1.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/361

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.19.9...v0.20.0

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.20.1
entry.content:
Features

  • Added OIDC support, see the wiki for how to set it up and how to connect existing users. (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/56cf382b4768ff54e768a5aa1b8d697b428efbbb)

Maintenance

  • build(deps-dev): bump ruff from 0.9.9 to 0.9.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/364

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.20.0...v0.20.1

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.20.2
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixes the SOCIALACCOUNT_ONLY variable not working correctly when set to True. (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/670e757efc7352e87665025e178e5f2b1744e8a0)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.20.1...v0.20.2

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.20.3
entry.content:
Features

  • Added saving sorting preferences for the home page, media list page for each media type, lists page and list detail page. #363 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/2052169d103b3d7d68f425d372938f542b937006)
  • Added REDIRECT_LOGIN_TO_SSO variable to automatically redirect users from the login page to the SSO provider. (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/4837874a96e0897dd6d11156b39eef8d171586c5)

Fixes

  • Fixed OIDC not working with HTTPS, protocol will be chosen depending on URLS and CSRF values, can be set manually with ACCOUNT_DEFAULT_HTTP_PROTOCOL #365 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/b13a2d359f05909a26c882cc896a901a4a162121)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.20.2...v0.20.3
